document.full_text: president mahmoud abbas of the palestinian authority beseeched a group of visiting american jews to urge congress not to cut off hundreds of millions of dollars in aid.
document.title: abbas urges continuation of u.s. aid despite agreement with hamas
lines_and_colors: president mahmoud abbas of the palestinian authority beseeched a group of visiting american jews to urge congress not to cut off hundreds of millions of dollars in aid.
